Dhaga | Exotic Vintage Clothing – Pune 2023 Read More »
item.content:encoded:
When it comes to fashion, visuals are key. It’s no wonder, then, that many lovers of style turn to Instagram and fashion blogs to get their fill of all things fashion. Instagram is great when it comes to OOTDs—outfit of the day—and quick style inspirations, but blogs are where the serious fashionistas go to write about trends, advice, and the latest fashion innovations.

The rise of fashionable Instagram influencers and stylists paved the way for the bloggers on our list to have a significant presence online. Many of these bloggers started out on social media, and their keen eye for style did not go unnoticed by their followers.

It brings together the world’s leading creative institute, and students interested in the field of creative arts, design and technology. …

Global Art & Camp; Design Education Expo 2023 – Pune Read More »
item.content:encoded:
India’s biggest Art & Design focused higher education fair organized by Zista Events

Welcome to the 7th edition of the Global Art & Design Education Expo; India’s biggest Art and Design focused higher education fair. It brings together the world’s leading creative institute, and students interested in the field of creative arts, design and technology. Join us, and immerse yourself in an engaging, inspiring environment designed to shape the artists of tomorrow.

Benefits to Students:

• Get deeper insights into career opportunities in Art & Design

• Meet expert representatives and academicians

• Attend thought-provoking breakout sessions and learn from panel discussions

• Meet like-minded peers and exchange ideas

item.title: Lock The Box – Bookfair Pune 2023
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
As the second wave of pandemic nears its end, Lock the box – Bookfairs will not be the same anymore. It will have to have the added practices we have learnt to cope in the abnormal situations. Book fairs need to address requirements of the new normal. Concerns such as social distancing, wearing of masks, …

Lock The Box – Bookfair Pune 2023 Read More »
item.content:encoded:
As the second wave of pandemic nears its end, Lock the box – Bookfairs will not be the same anymore. It will have to have the added practices we have learnt to cope in the abnormal situations. Book fairs need to address requirements of the new normal. Concerns such as social distancing, wearing of masks, vaccination etc. will all be part of the new normal.

“In the new age of book fairs, the online and /or hybrid models will be tried by various organizers from time to time. The event will be fine-tuned to suit requirements of one and all. We at Pune Bookfair will ensure that the modern day practices and the requirements of the new normal will be incorporated in our exhibitions, conferences and meets (offline) so as to benefit one and all.
